H1.text: how many episodes of the killing on netflix. 10

H2.text: how many episodes of the killing on netflix. 4

H3.text: how many episodes of the killing on netflix. 6

A4.text: Netflix announced it had picked up The Killing for a fourth and final season consisting of six episodes.

A5.text: The Killing was again cancelled by AMC in September 2013, but Netflix announced in November 2013 that it had ordered a fourth season consisting of six episodes to conclude the series.
